title: Bug 10593: Jar export should add ".jar" suffix if not specified
OB: When exporting a set of selected files using the jar export feature in build 20020228, if a custom name is entered without a ".jar" suffix, the exported jar file is created without the ".jar" suffix.
EB: The jar export feature should add the ".jar" suffix to the custom name if it is not specified, so that the exported jar file has the correct file extension.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Start build 20020228.
2. Select some files to export.
3. Use the jar export feature.
4. Enter a custom name without the ".jar" suffix.
5. Verify that the exported jar file is created with the correct ".jar" suffix.
